name: APE STRONG TOGETHER - GTMK 2021 JAM
description:
STORY:

THE APES MUST UNIONIZE!

It's for the benefit of the planet, or something like that.

You play as an Ape who must merge with other apes to ensure that the apes all work together!

CONTROLS:

A & D - Move

ESC - Pause

R - Restart Level

Space - Jump & Double Jump

STUCK ON A LEVEL!

Skip it from the pause menu! OR refer to the posted walkthrough video!

FINALLY...

Please enjoy!

MUSIC SOURCES:

https://opengameart.org/content/puzzle-tune-1 

Factory Ambience

Jungle Ambience

Heaven Music

City Ambience
